title: Dice.com Job Scraper Input
description: Configure the Dice.com job scraper with search parameters and options.

searchQuery.title: Search Query
searchQuery.description: Job title, keywords, or company name to search for (e.g., 'Software Engineer', 'Python Developer')

location.title: Location
location.description: City, state, or zip code (e.g., 'New York, NY', 'Remote', '10001')

radius.title: Search Radius (miles)
radius.description: Search radius in miles from the location

postedDate.title: Posted Within
postedDate.description: Filter jobs by when they were posted

workplaceTypes.title: Workplace Type
workplaceTypes.description: Filter by workplace type (remote, on-site, hybrid)

easyApply.title: Easy Apply Only
easyApply.description: Only show jobs with Easy Apply option

maxJobs.title: Maximum Jobs
maxJobs.description: Maximum number of jobs to scrape (0 for unlimited)

scrapeJobDetails.title: Scrape Full Job Details
scrapeJobDetails.description: Whether to visit each job page for full details (slower but more data)

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Optional custom start URLs (overrides search parameters)
